definition: tail/end/small change/odd sum remaining after large round number
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
bamboo, rattan or wicker basket/sedan chair for mountain use (Cantonese)
baby/small child/(arch.) slave among ethnic minorities
wooden club (used to beat clothes in washing)
pot-scrubbing brush made of bamboo strips/basket (container) for chopsticks/variant of 筲[shao1]
mute person/dumb person/(more commonly called 啞巴|哑巴[ya3 ba5])
